response.original_title: j-hope Tour 'HOPE ON THE STAGE' in JAPAN: LIVE VIEWING
response.overview: j-hope Tour ‘HOPE ON THE STAGE’ is the BTS star's first solo world tour, where not only can the audience see the long-awaited return of 'j-hope on stage,' but also the hopes, wishes, and dreams of both him and the audience come to life.  The tour features his solo hits like Chicken Noodle Soup (feat. Becky G), which charted on the Billboard Hot 100, as well as Arson, on the street (with J. Cole), and even his new song Sweet Dreams (feat. Miguel), which had never been performed before and was pre-released during the tour, receiving an enthusiastic response from the audience. In addition to his solo tracks, performances of BTS’s iconic group songs like MIC Drop, Silver Spoon, and Dis-ease were also highlights of the concert.
response.title: j-hope Tour 'HOPE ON THE STAGE' in JAPAN: LIVE VIEWING
